title: Falling for the Genie
description: He popped into her life. But she’s the only one who can see him. When Lily Richards digs a lamp out of a dumpster and gives it a rub, she never expects a genie to actually appear. Tall, dazzling, with piercing blue eyes and golden skin—someone like that can’t possibly be real. But he is, to her eyes only, and he’s here to grant her three wishes. After that, he’ll move on to his next master, and she’ll forget all about him. Simple enough. Except, every time he looks at her, her stomach twists in knots. And when he touches her, her skin sizzles. She’s falling hard and fast for her genie, and it looks like he feels the same. But Lily needs to wish or else he’ll die. And if she uses up her last one, he’ll disappear from her life and heart forever…
author: Dee J. Stone
